PREFIX up: <http://purl.uniprot.org/core/>
SELECT ?protein ?disease
WHERE {
  ?protein a up:Protein .
  ?protein up:annotation ?annotation .
  ?annotation a up:Disease_Annotation .
  ?annotation up:disease ?disease .
}

task_results.query: Select all bacterial taxa and their scientific name from the UniProt taxonomy

rollouts.answer: This SPARQL query selects all bacterial taxa and their scientific names from the UniProt taxonomy. It uses the transitive subClassOf relationship (rdfs:subClassOf+) to find all taxa that are descendan
rollouts.sparql:
PREFIX taxon: <http://purl.uniprot.org/taxonomy/>
PREFIX up: <http://purl.uniprot.org/core/>
PREFIX rdfs: <http://www.w3.org/2000/01/rdf-schema#>

SELECT ?taxon ?scientificName
WHERE {
  ?taxon rdfs:subClassOf+ taxon:2 .
  ?taxon up:scientificName ?scientificName .
